TopicTitle: Why isn't there a "START HERE" sticky?

Articles.Content:
I have experience writting C# and no experience writting KSP plugins, there's no documentation pinned here to help me get started, only pinned documentations for people who already know what they're doing and API listings. 

this forum really needs a "START HERE" sticky.
Probably because its all on the wiki currently

3 hours ago, Crzyrndm said:

Probably because its all on the wiki currently

Still, should be some sort of sticky with that link...

Near the bottom of the OP there are several resources for plug-in development. There are even some video tutorials, though they are from 2013. Below those are some links, a few of which claim to be up-to-date.

Several posts have been removed from this thread. They were unrelated to the subject of the thread, and had become an argument. If you people want to discuss those issues, make your own thread, and keep it polite.
